column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Sarah - Thanks for the 5-star review! I'm glad you decided to give us a try. As it turns out
column2: we are a franchise concept that originated in Los Angeles
column3: so I'm very happy to know our ramen stacks up against that west coast ramen! Thank you again for your business
column4: and we look forward to serving you again soon.
